title: Ping Spike and message "Unable to connect to server"
body: So been playing a couple games today my ping has over doubled since the patch... after 2 games tonight just tried to play a third during the game load it went black and then told me "Unable to connect to server please check your internet connection and try again"... my internet hasn't changed everything else works fine... all of the troubleshooting comes up clear... I don't want to get a consequence for this what do i do...

replies.body: There were some issues last night accessing League for a lot of players, especially in the east coast.  Everything should be alright now, but let me know.
